alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:50AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Itasca and northwestern Cass Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1050 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lower Red Lake, to 6 miles northwest of Lake George, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Itasca and northwestern Cass Counties, including the following locations... Orth, Rosy, Portage Lake, Cass Lake, Decker Lake, Wilkinson, Dixon Lake, Schley and Ten Mile Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
